acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill arrays with elements
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillArraysWithElements

tag.name: Basic types/Podam factory basic types test

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ArrayPojo
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type class java.lang.String
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type class java.lang.Object
